mechanics.trigger: Casting Counterspell targeting a creature casting a spell
mechanics.condition: Target creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower
mechanics.outcome: Target creature's spell fails and has no effect

mechanics.trigger: Casting Counterspell targeting a creature casting a spell
mechanics.condition: Target creature is casting a spell of 4th level or higher AND Ability check using your spellcasting ability succeeds against a DC equal to (10 + the target's spell level)
mechanics.outcome: Target creature's spell fails and has no effect

description_text: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
